# List

A list store collections of objects (single value, vector or matrix).

```{r}
l <- list(
  v = c(1,2,3,4),
  m = matrix(c(1,1,1,1),nrow=2,ncol=2)
)
```
```{r}
l
```

# List

```{r}
l <- list(
  v = c(1,2,3,4),
  m = matrix(c(1,1,1,1),nrow=2,ncol=2)
)
```
```{r results="hold"}
l$v
#equivalent: l[['v']]
```
